section.title: Mono upgrade to 4.0
section.para: Older verisons of Mono, Mono 3.0 and 2.10, are no longer supported. For building Mono 4 is required Mono itself, at least verison Mono 3.4 or monolight, little compiler for the first build. Mono 4 is able to run cross-platform application requiring compatibility with Microsoft .Net Framework 4.5
